data.oai_dc:dc: Florida Bay Stable Isotope Data, Everglades National Park, South Florida from September 2000 to December 2003
Stable isotope analysis for 15N and 13C for seagrass collected during visits to TS/PH 7-11. Graphic representation of data can be located at http://serc.fiu.edu/seagrass/!CDreport/DataHome.htm
stable isotope|Florida Bay|Everglades National Park|2000|2003|delta 13C|delta 15N|seagrass species|Thalassia testudinum|Syringodium filiforme|Halodule wrightii
